name: The Color Trials
description:
Submission for Minijam 111 Colors game jam

In the game you control a white cube that emits colors, the goal of each level is to completely fill all the white tiles without stepping on a tile twice.

Click on dark enemies in order to either push or pull them, also click on the directional arrows in order to move in that direction.

Press r to restart if you step on a tile twice

Press enter to go to the next level after solving a puzzle

There are 10 levels, enjoy

It might be a little rough on the edges, but this is my second game ever.

All assets including sprites and music were made by myself.
